comments.body: Is running the munger a second time going to shorten this to `../user-guide`?

We should at least understand this lest it come back to bite us in the tush.

An up-to-date documentation page for this tool is available here: [kubectl manual](../../docs/user-guide/kubectl/kubectl.md)

By default, `kubectl` will use the `kubeconfig` file generated during the cluster startup for authenticating against the API.

comments.body: The unpack is unnecessary if you are building from source.  Users should be able to (a) download and unpack binary release or (b) `make release`.  After that, everything should work regardless.
